com.netflix.fenzo.triggers

Class ScheduledTrigger<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.fenzo.triggers.Trigger<T>
      • com.netflix.fenzo.triggers.ScheduledTrigger<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CronTrigger, IntervalTrigger

    public abstract class ScheduledTrigger<T>
extends Trigger<T>
    Placeholder super class for all the triggers that can be scheduled.
